mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, F.FUND_DATE, F.FUND_NO, PJ.PROJECT_NO, R.REWARD_NO, M.ACCOUNT, PJ.CATEGORY, C.CATEGORY_DIV, PJ.END_DATE, PJ.PROJECT_TITLE, M.COMPANY_NAME, D.DELIVERY_SITE, R.DELIVERY_MONEY, R.START_DATE, R.OPTIONS, R.REWARD_MONEY, DS.INVOICE_NUMBER, M.POINT FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN FUND F ON(M.MEMBER_NO = F.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN REWARD R ON(F.REWARD_NO = R.REWARD_NO) LEFT JOIN PROJECT PJ ON(R.PROJECT_NO = PJ.PROJECT_NO) LEFT JOIN PAYMENT P ON(F.FUND_NO = P.FUND_NO) LEFT JOIN DELIVERY_STATUS DS ON(P.PAY_NO = DS.PAY_NO) LEFT JOIN DELIVERY D ON(DS.DELIVERY_NO = D.DELIVERY_NO) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON(C.CATEGORY = PJ.CATEGORY) WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{ userNo }
